pages.text: The **Pigment Pedestal** is the block where you craft most of the recipes for Spectrum.\\To start crafting trigger it with a [Paintbrush](book://general/paintbrush) or supply a [#](449900)redstone signal[#]().\It requires air, or an inventory above it.

\Most recipes require [Gemstone Powder](book://general/gemstone_powder) as an ingredient.\\The Pedestal also acts as a [#](bb00bb)Crafting Table[#]() and can therefore also be used to craft vanilla recipes.\\You can use a [Crafting Tablet](book://magical_items/crafting_tablet) to automate both Spectrum and Vanilla recipes.

pages.title: Variants
pages.text: \The Pigment Pedestal can be built with your gemstone of choice.\\While they do look different they are the same, functionally.
